thread.section_title: The Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous Hotel, amazing staff !!!
thread.title_full: Fabulous Hotel, amazing staff !!! - Review of The Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Adriana C
title: Fabulous Hotel, amazing staff !!!
text:
Stayed one night with my friend and had such a lovely experience. The staff were polite, the studio suite was clean, luxurious and just beautiful. We had some drinks at the bar and an amazing dinner.
The location suited us perfectly, as we needed to be in central London the next morning.
Highly recommend this gorgeous hotel, extremely good service.
Best,
A.
